name: altar of death
description: after you play a card here, destroy it to get +2 energy next turn.
descriptionZh: 你在此区域放置一张卡牌后，摧毁该卡牌然后在下回合+2能量。

name: asgard
description: after turn 4, whoever is winning here draws  {location.drawcount:card|cards}.
descriptionZh: 第4回合后，在此区域领先的玩家抽2张牌。

name: asteroid m
description: after you play a 3 or 4-cost card, move it here.
descriptionZh: 当你放置初始能量消耗为3或4的卡牌后，会将该卡牌移动至此区域。

name: atlantis
description: if you only have one card here, it has +5 power.
descriptionZh: 若你在此区域仅有1张卡牌，使其+5战力。

name: attilan
description: after turn 3, shuffle your hand into your deck. draw  cards.
descriptionZh: 第3回合后，将你的手牌洗进你的卡组，并抽3张牌。

name: aunt may's
description: the first card you play here gets +3 power and moves.

name: avengers compound
description: on turn 5, all cards must be played here.
descriptionZh: 第5回合中，所有卡牌都只能放置在此区域。

name: bar sinister
description: after you play a card here, fill this location with copies of it.
descriptionZh: 你在此区域放置一张卡牌后，用该卡牌的复制牌填满此区域。

name: bar with no name
description: whoever has the least power here wins.
descriptionZh: 战力较低的玩家可赢下此区域。

name: baxter building
description: whoever is winning this location gets +3 power at the others.
descriptionZh: 在此区域领先的玩家会在其他区域+3战力。

name: camp lehigh
description: add a random 3-cost card to each player's hand.
descriptionZh: 随机将一张初始能量消耗为3的卡牌添加到双方手牌。

name: central park
description: add a squirrel to each location.
descriptionZh: 向每个区域添加1张松鼠。

name: cloning vats
description: after you play a card here, add a copy to your hand.
descriptionZh: 你在此区域放置一张卡牌后，将1张复制牌添加到你的手牌。

name: collapsed mine
description: fill this location with rocks. skip a turn to destroy your rocks.
descriptionZh: 用石块填满此区域。跳过一个回合即可摧毁你的石块。

name: counter-earth
description: after you play a card here, create a copy at this location.
descriptionZh: 你在此区域放置一张卡牌后，会在此区域添加1张它的复制牌。

name: crimson cosmos
description: cards that cost 1, 2, or 3 can't be played here.
descriptionZh: 能量消耗为1、2或3的卡牌不可放置在此区域。

name: crystal towers
description: shuffle your hand into your deck. draw 3 cards.
descriptionZh: 将你的手牌洗入卡组，并抽3张牌。

name: daily bugle
description: get a copy of a card in your opponent's hand.
descriptionZh: 获取你对手手牌中一张牌的复制。

name: danger room
description: cards played here have a 25% chance to be destroyed.
descriptionZh: 放置在此区域的卡牌有25%的几率被摧毁。

name: dark dimension
description: cards here are not revealed until the game ends.
descriptionZh: 此区域的卡牌在对战结束之前不会揭开。

name: death's domain
description: after you play a card here, destroy it.
descriptionZh: 你在此区域放置一张卡牌后，该卡牌会被摧毁。

name: deep space
description: card text is disabled here.
descriptionZh: 在此区域卡牌文本无效。

name: district x
description: replace both decks with 10 random cards.
descriptionZh: 用10张随机卡牌替换双方卡组。

name: dream dimension
description: on turn 5, cards cost  more.
descriptionZh: 在第5回合，卡牌能量消耗+1。

name: ego
description: ego takes over and plays your cards for you.
descriptionZh: 伊戈接管你的牌局，替你出牌。

name: elysium
description: cards cost 1 less.
descriptionZh: 卡牌能量消耗-1。

name: eternity range
description: after turn 3, add a rock to the losing player's side.
descriptionZh: 第3回合后，为在此落后的玩家添加一张石块。

name: fisk tower
description: when a card moves here, destroy it.
descriptionZh: 当有牌移动到此区域时，摧毁该牌。

name: flooded
description: cards can't be played here.
descriptionZh: 此区域不可放置卡牌。

name: flooding
description: this is the last turn cards can be played here.
descriptionZh: 此回合是在此区域放置卡牌的最后机会。

name: fogwell's gym
description: both players get double card xp this game.
descriptionZh: 双方本局对战均获得双倍强化套组。

name: gamma lab
description: after turn 3, transform all cards here into the hulk.
descriptionZh: 第3回合后，将此区域的所有卡牌变成浩克。

name: genosha
description: you can move cards to this location.
descriptionZh: 你可将牌移动至此区域。

name: grand central
description: after turn 5, put a card from each player's hand here.
descriptionZh: 第5回合后，从双方手牌各抽取1张卡牌放置于此区域。

name: great web
description: after each turn, move one card to the web for a random player.

name: hala
description: after turn 4, destroy all cards controlled by the player losing here.
descriptionZh: 第4回合后，摧毁在此区域落后玩家的所有卡牌。

name: hell's kitchen
description: draw a 1-cost card from your deck.
descriptionZh: 从卡组中抽取1张初始能量消耗为1的卡牌。

name: hellfire club
description: cards that cost 1 can't be played here.
descriptionZh: 能量消耗为1卡牌不可放置在此区域。

name: isle of silence
description: ongoing effects are disabled here.
descriptionZh: 此区域的持续效果无法触发。

name: jotunheim
description: after each turn, cards here lose 1 power.
descriptionZh: 每回合结束后，此区域的卡牌-1战力。

name: k'un-lun
description: when a card moves here, give it +2 power.
descriptionZh: 当有卡牌移动至此区域时，使其+2战力。

name: kamar-taj
description: on reveal effects happen twice at this location.
descriptionZh: 此区域揭示效果触发两次。

name: klyntar
description: after turn 4, merge your cards here into a symbiote.
descriptionZh: 第4回合后，将你在此区域的牌融合成一张融合怪。

name: knowhere
description: on reveal effects do not happen at this location.
descriptionZh: 此区域的揭示效果不触发。

name: krakoa
description: on turn 5, takes over and plays both players' cards for them.
descriptionZh: 在第5回合，克拉科岛将主导场面，替两位玩家出牌。

name: kyln
description: you can't play cards here after turn 4.
descriptionZh: 第4回合后，你不能在此区域放置卡牌

name: lamentis-1
description: draw 3 cards. destroy both decks.
descriptionZh: 抽3张牌。摧毁双方卡组。

name: lechuguilla
description: after you play a card here, shuffle 3 rocks into your deck.
descriptionZh: 你在此区域放置卡牌后，会将3张石块洗入你的卡组。

name: lemuria
description: no cards are revealed this turn.
descriptionZh: 此回合牌不会揭开。

name: limbo
description: there is a turn 7 this game.
descriptionZh: 本局对战有7个回合。

name: los diablos base
description: after turn 3, ruin a random location.
descriptionZh: 回合后，随机毁掉一个区域。

name: luke's bar
description: after you play a card here, return it to your hand.
descriptionZh: 你在此区域放置一张卡牌后，会将其退回你的手牌。

name: machineworld
description: after you play a card here, add a copy to the opponent's hand.
descriptionZh: 你在此区域放置一张卡牌后，会将它的1张复制牌添加到对手的手牌。

name: madripoor
description: you can move cards from this location.

name: milano
description: turn 5 is the only turn cards can be played here.
descriptionZh: 第5回合是在此区域放置卡牌的唯一机会。

name: mindscape
description: at the start of turn 6, swap hands.
descriptionZh: 第6回合开始时，交换手牌。

name: miniaturized lab
description: on turns 3, 4, and 5, no cards can be added here.
descriptionZh: 在第3、4、5回合，此区域不能放置卡牌。

name: mirror dimension
description: on turn 4, transform into one of the other locations.
descriptionZh: 在第4合，此区域变成场上的一个其他区域。

name: mojoworld
description: whoever has more cards here gets +100 power.
descriptionZh: 此区域拥有更多卡牌的玩家+100战力。

name: monster island
description: add a monster-power  here for each player.
descriptionZh: 为双方区域各添加1张9战力的怪物。

name: monster metropolis
description: the card(s) with the highest power here get +3 power.
descriptionZh: 此区域战力最高的卡牌+3战力。

name: morag
description: you can't play your first card here each turn.
descriptionZh: 你每回合的第1张卡牌不能放置在此区域。

name: mother mold
description: when you play a card here, add a sentinel to your hand.
descriptionZh: 当你在此区域放置卡牌时，将1张哨兵机器人添加到你的手牌。

name: mt. wundagore
description: after you play a card here, discard a card.
descriptionZh: 你在此区域放置一张卡牌后，会丢弃一张卡牌。

name: muir island
description: after each turn, give cards here +1 power.
descriptionZh: 每回合结束后，此区域的卡牌+1战力。

name: murderworld
description: after turn 3, destroy all cards here.
descriptionZh: 第3回合后，摧毁此区域的所有卡牌。

name: necrosha
description:
cards here have
-2 power.
descriptionZh: 此区域的卡牌-2战力

name: negative zone
description:
cards here have
-3 power.
descriptionZh: 此区域的卡牌-3战力

name: new york
descriptionZh: 第6回合，你可以将卡牌移动到此区域。

name: nidavellir
description:
cards here have
+5 power.
descriptionZh: 此区域的卡牌+5战力

name: nova roma
description: draw a card.
descriptionZh: 抽一张牌

name: olympia
description: draw 2 cards.
descriptionZh: 抽两张牌。

name: onslaught's citadel
description: ongoing effects here are doubled.
descriptionZh: 此区域持续效果翻倍。

name: orchis forge
description: after you play a card here, add a sentinel to your hand.
descriptionZh: 当你在此区域放置卡牌时，将1张哨兵机器人添加到你的手牌。

name: oscorp tower
description: after turn 3, all cards here swap sides.
descriptionZh: 第3回合后，此区域所有卡牌换边。

name: pet mansion
description: this turn, all cards must be played here.
descriptionZh: 本回合中，所有卡牌都只能放置在此区域。

name: pleasant hill
description: after you play a card here, draw a card.
descriptionZh: 你在此区域放置一张卡牌后，抽一张卡牌。

name: plunder castle
description: only cards that cost 6 can be played here.
descriptionZh: 只能将能量消耗为6的卡牌放置在此区域。

name: project pegasus
description: +5 energy this turn.
descriptionZh: 本回合+5能量。

name: quantum realm
description: after you play a card here, set its base power to 2.
descriptionZh: 你在此区域放置一张卡牌后，会将其基础战力设为2。

name: quantum tunnel
description: after you play a card here, swap it with a card in your deck.
descriptionZh: 你在此区域放置一张卡牌后，会将其替换为你卡组中的一张卡牌。

name: rickety bridge
description: after each turn, if there is more than one card here, destroy them.
descriptionZh: 每回合后，若此区域的卡牌超过一张，摧毁这里所有的牌。

name: sakaar
description: put a card from each player's hand here.
descriptionZh: 从双方手牌中各抽1张卡牌，放置于此区域。

name: sanctum sanctorum
description: cards can't be played here.
descriptionZh: 此区域不可放置卡牌。

name: savage land
description: add two raptors on each side of this location.
descriptionZh: 为双方在此区域各添加2张迅猛龙。

name: sewer system
description:
cards here have
-1 power.
descriptionZh: 此区域的卡牌-1战力。

name: shadowland
description: add a ninja to each side with  power.
descriptionZh: 为双方区域各添加1张-2战力的忍者。

name: shuri's lab
description: after you play a card here, double its power.
descriptionZh: 你在此区域放置一张卡牌后，该卡牌战力翻倍。

name: sinister london
description: after you play a card here, add a copy to another location.
descriptionZh: 你在此区域放置一张卡牌后，会向另一区域添加1张复制牌。

name: sokovia
description: discard a card from each player's hand.
descriptionZh: 双方各从手牌中丢弃1张卡牌。

name: stark tower
description: after turn 5, give all cards here + power.
descriptionZh: 第5回合后，此区域的所有卡牌+2战力。

name: starlight citadel
description: after turn 4, swap the position of each location.
descriptionZh: 第4回合后，调换所有区域的位置。

name: strange academy
description: after turn 5, move all cards here to other random locations.
descriptionZh: 第5回合后，将此区域的所有卡牌随机移动至其他区域。

name: subterranea
description: shuffle 5 rocks into each deck.
descriptionZh: 向双方的卡组中各洗入5张石块。

name: t.a.h.i.t.i.
description: when a card is discarded or destroyed, add a copy here.
descriptionZh: 当卡牌被摧毁或丢弃时，将其复制添加到此区域。

name: the bifrost
description: after turn 4, move all cards one location to the right.
descriptionZh: 第4回合后，将所有卡牌向右移动一个区域。

name: the big house
description: cards that cost 4, 5, or 6 can't be played here.
descriptionZh: 能量消耗为4、5或6的卡牌不可放置在此区域。

name: the hub
description: add a random card to each player's hand.
descriptionZh: 随机将1张卡牌添加到双方手牌。

name: the ice box
description: give a card in each player’s hand +1 cost.
descriptionZh: 使双方各自手牌中的1张卡牌+1能量消耗。

name: the nexus
description: your power here is granted to other locations as well.
descriptionZh: 将此区域的战力赋予其他区域。

name: the peak
description: each card in your hand swaps its power and cost.
descriptionZh: 你每张手牌的战力值和能量消耗值互换。

name: the raft
description: first to fill this breaks out a 6-cost card. it costs 0.
descriptionZh: 率先填满此区域可抽1张初始能量消耗为6的卡牌。其能量消耗变为0。

name: the sacred timeline
description: first to fill this gets a copy of their opening hand.
descriptionZh: 率先填满此区域的玩家会获得其起始手牌的复制。

name: the sandbar
description: cards with abilities can’t be played here.
descriptionZh: 不能在此区域放置带有特殊效果的牌。

name: the space throne
description: only one card can be here for each player.
descriptionZh: 双方在此区域仅可有1张卡牌。

name: the superflow
description: if you have no cards here, +1 energy each turn.
descriptionZh: 若你在此区域没有卡牌，每回合+1能量。

name: the triskelion
description: fill each player's hand with random cards.
descriptionZh: 用随机卡牌填满双方手牌。

name: the vault
description: on turn 6, cards can't be played here.
descriptionZh: 在第6回合，此区域不能放置卡牌。

name: throne room
description: card(s) here with the highest power have their power doubled.
descriptionZh: 此区域战力最高的牌战力翻倍。

name: tinkerer's workshop
description: +1 energy this turn.
descriptionZh: 本回合+1能量。

name: titan
description: 6-cost cards cost  less.
descriptionZh: 初始能量消耗为6的卡牌-1能量消耗。

name: transia
description: swap the positions of each location.
descriptionZh: 调换所有区域的位置。

name: tva
description: after turn 4, end the game.
descriptionZh: 第4回合结束时，对战结束。

name: utopia
description: on turn 4, cards here can move.
descriptionZh: 在第4回合，此区域的卡牌可以移动。

name: vibranium mines
description: after you play here, shuffle 3 vibranium into your deck.
descriptionZh: 你在此区域放置卡牌后，会将3张振金洗入你的卡组。

name: vormir
description: the first card you play here is destroyed.
descriptionZh: 摧毁你在此区域放置的第1张卡牌。

name: wakanda
description: cards here can't be destroyed.
descriptionZh: 此区域的牌不会被摧毁。

name: wakandan embassy
description: give +2 power to cards in players' hands.
descriptionZh: 双方手牌中的卡牌+2战力。

name: warrior falls
description: after each turn, cards here fight! destroy the weakest one(s).
descriptionZh: 每回合后，此区域的牌会互斗！摧毁最弱的牌。

name: washington d.c.
description: cards here with no abilities have +3 power.
descriptionZh: 此区域中无特殊效果的卡牌+3战力。

name: weirdworld
description: both players draw from their opponent's decks.
descriptionZh: 双方均从对方卡组中抽卡牌。

name: westview
description: turns into a new location on turn 4.
descriptionZh: 在第4回合，变成一个新区域。

name: worldship
description: destroy the other locations.
descriptionZh: 摧毁其他区域。

name: x-mansion
description: after turn 3, add a random card here for each player.
descriptionZh: 第3回合后，为双方在此区域随机添加1张卡牌。

name: xandar
description:
cards here have
+1 power.
descriptionZh: 此区域的卡牌+1战力
